Description: ESP LTD DV8-R Dave Mustaine Signature V Guitar Black 23002/ms/1/store Please inspect your item(s) immediately upon receiving them. If you find an issue, please contact us immediately. Please do not return an item before contacting us. Remember! Items sold "AS IS" are NOT eligible for return! These items are listed w/ the problems that we are aware of, but may also have further technical issues that we are unaware of. Contact must be made within 7 days of receiving the item in order for us to assist you with item issues. FeedbackWe strive to ensure good customer relations. If there is a problem with your e-Bay transaction, please contact us before leaving a negative feedback and we will work with you to correct the problem. ~Note: If you are a CA resident a 9% sales tax will be applied. About Us-We buy merchandise from many different places. These include watch and jewelry trade shows, instrument trade shows, jobbers, flea markets, swap meets, pawnshops and second hand stores. This merchandise includes items such as high end and regular jewelry, guitars, amplifiers, pedals, other music andprofessional audio and DJ equipment, electronics, clothing, sporting goods, household items and just about anything else you can think of. My sale items are quite an eclectic group. About Our Items / Item Condition-Most of the items we sell are pre-owned and since Buyer happiness is our main goal we make every effort to make sure that the item is described as best as possible and to indicate any defect that might be present. Pictures are a big part of the description so please inspect the pictures and ask any questions you have. Since we sell such a wide variety of items we do not know everything about a lot of what we sell. The information in the auction mostly comes from internet information. The buyer usually knows more than we do about the item they are buying so once in a while there will be something that we missed in testing or describing the item. As stated above, if this is the case and you have a concern about your itemPLEASE CONTACT US FIRST BEFORE DOING ANYTHING ELSE. WE PROMISE TO ATTEND TO YOUR ISSUE IMMEDIATELY. Payment-Payment, in full, is expected within 2 days from the close of the auction! If payment is not received within this time period, a Non-Paying Bidder Notification will be filed with Ebay unless buyer asks for more time. Under no circumstances would we ask you to wire money. Beware of scams!!! Shipping-We try to get all of our items shipped within 1 business day (Monday-Friday). We do ship internationally but remember NO RETURNS FROM INTERNATIONAL BUYERS. Any international bidder hereby agrees to this term. ReturnsThere are NO RETURNS ON INTERNATIONAL ITEMS Feel free to contact us with any questions about our auctions PRIOR to bidding.
